questions.text: While inside Stark Towers who did Hulk say "Puny god" to while throwing this person around like a rag doll?
questions.explanation:
Loki.

	Loki was giving Hulk a speech about how great and powerful he was right before Hulk threw him back and forth on the floor. Loki surrendered after that.

questions.text: When describing the Avengers to Loki, how did Tony describe Captain America?
options: A man with breath-taking anger management issues
questions.explanation:
A super soldier.

	Tony described Thor as "the demi-god", Captain America as "a super soldier", the Hulk as "a man with breath-taking anger management issues", and Hawkeye and Black Widow as "a couple of master assassins".

questions.text: When the military pilot yelled into his radio, "Target angry! Target angry!", to whom was he referring?
questions.explanation:
Hulk.

	Nick Fury ordered for a pilot to distract the Hulk from tearing up the airship. The pilot got too close and the Hulk jumped out the window and destroyed the plane. The explosion hurtled the Hulk through the sky.

questions.text: What was Phase Two that Nick Fury had moved to the airship from the compound in the movie's beginning?
questions.explanation:
Weapons.

	When the compound was infiltrated, Nick had Phase Two taken out of the compound. Captain America found out what Phase Two was after investigating a locked area of the airship.

questions.text: Before the epic fight in the woods, what did Iron Man refer to Thor as?
questions.explanation:
Tourist.

	After Thor took Loki from the aircraft, Iron Man and Captain America went after him. Iron Man called Thor a tourist and then the two of them got into an epic fight. Captain America stopped it.

questions.text: When leaving Stark Towers, what kind of musician did Pepper Potts mention that Phil Coulson was seeing?
questions.explanation:
Cellist.

	Pepper was leaving town for Washington and was making small talk with Phil while they were on the elevator. Phil mentioned that she had gone back to Oregon.

questions.text: Who was the first member of the Avengers team that Natasha went to retrieve?
questions.explanation:
Bruce Banner.

	Phil Coulson had Natasha leave a mission she was on to go to Calcutta to retrieve Bruce Banner. Nick Fury got Captain America. Phil Coulson got Tony Stark.

questions.text: Stan Lee made a small cameo in the movie "The Avengers". Did he have any lines to say?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Stan Lee's one line was, "Super heroes in New York. Gimme a break."

questions.text: When trying to figure out where Loki would take the Tesseract, where did Tony realize Loki would want to go?
questions.explanation:
Stark Towers.

	While going over things with Steve, Tony realized Loki would want to be at a high building where everyone could see him. This is when he thought of Stark Towers in New York.

questions.text: The Avengers were able to eat at the Shawarma restaurant that Iron Man mentioned during the battle in New York.
questions.explanation:
True.

	At the end of the credits, the Avengers were seen sitting around the only table not broken or turned over in the Shawarma restaurant. There were no lines said in this scene.
